name: The Five Nights with Bloodtime Chronicles
name_original: The Five Nights with Bloodtime Chronicles
description:
Decided to upload all the games in The Five Nights with Bloodtime Chronicles to itch.io. This includes:

Five Nights with Bloodtime: Classic

Five Nights with Bloodtime 2: Classic

Five Nights with Bloodtime 3: Classic

Five Nights with Bloodtime 3: Christmas

Five Nights with Bloodtime: Rebooted (Recoded)

Only reskins are coming to the chronicles now.
